messages.message:
@Abhinav did as instructed, but getting a `tf` error here when provisioning the LZ:

```[2025-07-16T14:27:22.589Z] If you ever set or change modules or backend configuration for Terraform,

[2025-07-16T14:27:22.589Z] rerun this command to reinitialize your working directory. If you forget, other

[2025-07-16T14:27:22.590Z] commands will detect it and remind you to do so if necessary.

[2025-07-16T14:27:22.590Z] echo "tf-init ended"

[2025-07-16T14:27:22.590Z] tf-init ended

[2025-07-16T14:27:22.590Z] echo "tf-validate started"

[2025-07-16T14:27:22.590Z] tf-validate started

[2025-07-16T14:27:22.590Z] terraform -chdir=customer validate

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.200Z] ╷

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.201Z] │ Error: Unsupported argument

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.201Z] │ 

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.201Z] │   on main.tf (http://main.tf) line 192, in module "main":

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.201Z] │  192:   create_azure_services = var.create_azure_services

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.201Z] │ 

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.201Z] │ An argument named "create_azure_services" is not expected here.

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.201Z] ╵

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.201Z] ╷

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.202Z] │ Error: Unsupported argument

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.202Z] │ 

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.202Z] │   on main.tf (http://main.tf) line 193, in module "main":

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.202Z] │  193:   azure_primary_location = var.azure_primary_location

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.202Z] │ 

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.202Z] │ An argument named "azure_primary_location" is not expected here.

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.202Z] ╵

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.202Z] ╷

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.202Z] │ Error: Unsupported argument

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.202Z] │ 

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.202Z] │   on main.tf (http://main.tf) line 194, in module "main":

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.203Z] │  194:   azure_secondary_location = var.azure_secondary_location

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.203Z] │ 

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.203Z] │ An argument named "azure_secondary_location" is not expected here.

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.203Z] ╵

[2025-07-16T14:27:28.203Z] make: *** [Makefile:213: tf-validate] Error 1

script returned exit code 2```
Unblocked for now... @mfichman can u retry
